comments.author: Dave
comments.body: Whoa! These guys made a movie abt going through the pipecut!!? Guess Andy Warhol was right. Can't wait until Bif or Chad gets their first colonoscopy... won't that be fun. I'm headed back to Flag today to look for that French guy!

comments.author: Dave
comments.body: Flagstaff is worse than ever today... Two construction traffic stops before you even get to Die Lorelei. But it does look as if it's getting a total facelift, so Dr. Stauffer will love the descents when it's all done.
